item.title: Happy #LesbianVisibilityWeek to all in #OpenStreetMap! #LesbianVisibilityDay #OSM #Lesbian The OpenStreetMap logo, but in the 5 colour lesbian pride flag colours
The @sotm Working Group is willing to answer your questions and help you work on a bid! #SotM #OpenStreetMap #OSM

Are you interested in hosting State of the Map 2024? Applications are open! Help bring the largest #OpenStreetMap event to your region! read more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/04/06/state-of-the-map-2024-call-for-venues-open/ #OSM #gischat #maps #geo
Are you an #OSM'er who participated in a past #GSoC ? Drop a comment about what to expect or other good advice. (Applications are open until April 4). #GoogleSummerOfCode

Interested in participating in #GSoC this summer? Applications are open! OSM-specific information is available on the blog and the @GoogleOSS GSoC timeline is here: https://developers.google.com/open-source/gsoc/timeline
Want to learn more about the Local Chapters and Communities Working Group? Check out the LCCWG wiki: https://wiki.osmfoundation.org/wiki/Local_Chapters_and_Communities_Working_Group
re the photo: that's @MaggieMaps and @joostjakob leading the discussion.

In November, the LCCWG hosted the 3rd annual virtual Local Chapters and Communities Congress 2022. You can watch these presentations here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8rqr4RxWfkFuy58q14uHkCeRs4_1QAJd
In Firenze, at the in-person event, there was a brainstorming session, presentations about organizing, community building and mapping projects. Bonus--every continent was represented IRL üôåüèª

Today's OSM blog post from the LCCWG looks back on last year's Local Chapters Congress events. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/20/local-chapters-congress-live-online-in-2022/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM

Applications for @GoogleOSS GSoC are open today until April 4 (details on the blog). Pro tip: Don't wait until the last minute to apply--meet with your mentor early to make sure you present your best work. #OpenStreetMap #GSoC #OpenSource https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/16/join-osm-open-source-development-with-gsoc-2023/

The application window for #GSoC opens on March 20, and OSM'ers are encouraged to apply. Why? "because of OSM's diverse software ecosystem, you can choose from projects involving a variety of tools, technology and programming languages." Learn more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/16/join-osm-open-source-development-with-gsoc-2023/ #OpenStreetMap #GoogleSummerOfCode

Heads up on the OSMF "Consultation on Fundraising Strategy:" submit your ideas, questions, concerns until March 22. https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/consultation-on-fundraising-strategy/96988?u=courtiney #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OpenStreetMapFoundation #funding

Applications for #GSoC open on Monday. Who should apply? "you ideally have done some mapping and had an opportunity to get to know the community...and software" More details on the OSM blog. #osm #opensource @GoogleOSS https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/16/join-osm-open-source-development-with-gsoc-2023/
Happy to be able to welcome the #openstreetmap foundation's newest corporate member! RT @TomTom@twitter.com: Read more about how we're supporting the OpenStreetMap Foundation below!

Join #openstreetmap Open Source Development for Google Summer of Code 2023! GSoC applications open on Monday, March 20. / @googleoss@twitter.com #opensource #osm https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/16/join-osm-open-source-development-with-gsoc-2023/

We're happy to be welcoming @TomTom as a Platinum corporate member of the OSMF. Thanks for giving such strong financial support for the stability and quality of #openstreetmap! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/16/welcome-tomtom-our-first-platinum-corporate-member/

Ahead of tomorrow‚Äôs International Women‚Äôs Day, we put the spotlight on @geoladiesph. Happy #IWD2023 to them and all women in OSM! To join the celebration, check the post for a list of events around #InternationalWomensDay2023 #EmbraceEquity #OpenStreetMap https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/03/07/international-womens-day-meet-geoladies-ph/

Procrastinators take note! It's just one week to the March 13 deadline for submitting a proposal to the EWG for "Adding the Ability to Mute Users" https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/02/10/ewg-project-deadline-adding-the-ability-to-mute-users/

Craig Allen is getting traction on election promises by building diversity and inclusion, improving documentation, and building connections in Africa--read the rest of his statement here: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/01/27/2023-on-the-osmf-board-our-individual-views/ RT @openstreetmap@twitter.com Craig Allen (South Africa) https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/cRaIgalLAn üê¶üîó: https://twitter.com/openstreetmap/status/1616766701202284547
